languages.text: "Его мелочные желания и смехотворная жажда мести укрыли Истину от его взора. Он сам избрал себе судьбу жертвы, сойдя с начертанного пути и позволив его провалам дать дорогу тебе, чемпион".

"His petty desires and ridiculous thirst for revenge obscured the Truth from his eyes. He chose his sacrificial destiny himself when he strayed from the path charted for him and allowed his failures to make way for you, champion."
languages.original_text: "Его мелочные желания и смехотворная жажда мести укрыли Истину от его взора. Он сам избрал себе судьбу жертвы, сойдя с начертанного пути и позволив его провалам дать дорогу тебе, чемпион".

traits.locale_text: "His petty desires and ridiculous thirst for revenge had obscured the Truth from his eyes. He chose his sacrificial destiny himself when he strayed from the path charted for him and allowed his failures to make way for you, champion."
traits.speaker: DarkApostleVision

traits.locale_text: "His petty desires and ridiculous thirst for revenge obscured the Truth from his eyes. He chose his sacrificial destiny himself when he strayed from the path charted for him and allowed his failures to make way for you, champion."
traits.speaker: DarkApostleVision

languages.text: “他那狭隘的欲望与可笑的复仇计划，遮蔽了他眼中的真相。当他偏离了为他规划的道路，败在了你的手上时，他便自己踏上了沦为祭品的道路，勇士。”
languages.original_text: "His petty desires and ridiculous thirst for revenge obscured the Truth from his eyes. He chose his sacrificial destiny himself when he strayed from the path charted for him and allowed his failures to make way for you, champion."

traits.locale_text: “他那狭隘的欲望与可笑的复仇计划，遮蔽了他眼中的真相。当他偏离了为他规划的道路，败在了你的手上时，他便自己踏上了沦为祭品的道路，勇士。”
traits.speaker: DarkApostleVision

languages.text: "Seine kleinlichen Begierden und sein lächerlicher Rachedurst haben seine Augen blind für die Wahrheit gemacht. Er hat sein Schicksal als Opfer selbst gewählt, als er von dem Pfad abgewichen ist, der ihm vorgegeben war, und durch sein Versagen Platz für Euch gemacht hat, Champion."
languages.original_text: "His petty desires and ridiculous thirst for revenge obscured the Truth from his eyes. He chose his sacrificial destiny himself when he strayed from the path charted for him and allowed his failures to make way for you, champion."

traits.locale_text: "Seine kleinlichen Begierden und sein lächerlicher Rachedurst haben seine Augen blind für die Wahrheit gemacht. Er hat sein Schicksal als Opfer selbst gewählt, als er von dem Pfad abgewichen ist, der ihm vorgegeben war, und durch sein Versagen Platz für Euch gemacht hat, Champion."
traits.speaker: DarkApostleVision

languages.text: «Sus deseos banales y su ridícula sed de venganza habían ofuscado la Verdad a sus ojos. Él mismo selló su destino como sacrificio cuando se desvió del camino que fue trazado para él; sus fracasos suponen una oportunidad para ti, adalid».
languages.original_text: "His petty desires and ridiculous thirst for revenge obscured the Truth from his eyes. He chose his sacrificial destiny himself when he strayed from the path charted for him and allowed his failures to make way for you, champion."

traits.locale_text: «Sus deseos banales y su ridícula sed de venganza habían ofuscado la Verdad a sus ojos. Él mismo selló su destino como sacrificio cuando se desvió del camino que fue trazado para él; sus fracasos suponen una oportunidad para ti, adalid».
traits.speaker: DarkApostleVision

languages.text: « Ses désirs insignifiants et sa soif de vengeance ridicule l'ont coupé de la vérité. Il a lui-même choisi ce sort sacrificiel quand il s'est éloigné de la voie qui lui avait été tracée. Ses échecs vous ont ainsi permis de vous élever, {mf|champion|championne}. »
languages.original_text: "His petty desires and ridiculous thirst for revenge obscured the Truth from his eyes. He chose his sacrificial destiny himself when he strayed from the path charted for him and allowed his failures to make way for you, champion."

traits.locale_text: « Ses désirs insignifiants et sa soif de vengeance ridicule l'ont coupé de la vérité. Il a lui-même choisi ce sort sacrificiel quand il s'est éloigné de la voie qui lui avait été tracée. Ses échecs vous ont ainsi permis de vous élever, {mf|champion|championne}. »
traits.speaker: DarkApostleVision

languages.text: 「つまらない欲望と馬鹿げた復讐への渇望が、彼の目から真実を隠してしまっていた。彼のために描かれた道から外れた時に彼は自ら犠牲となる運命を選び、その失敗が王者であるお前のために道を開いたんだ」
languages.original_text: "His petty desires and ridiculous thirst for revenge obscured the Truth from his eyes. He chose his sacrificial destiny himself when he strayed from the path charted for him and allowed his failures to make way for you, champion."

traits.locale_text: 「つまらない欲望と馬鹿げた復讐への渇望が、彼の目から真実を隠してしまっていた。彼のために描かれた道から外れた時に彼は自ら犠牲となる運命を選び、その失敗が王者であるお前のために道を開いたんだ」
traits.speaker: DarkApostleVision

languages.text: "Acınası arzuları ve absürt intikam açlığı, onun gözlerini Hakikat'e karşı kör etti. Kendisi için belirlenen yoldan saptığında kurbanlık kaderini bizzat seçmiş oldu. İşte bu tercihi, senin yolunu açtı müdafi."
languages.original_text: "His petty desires and ridiculous thirst for revenge obscured the Truth from his eyes. He chose his sacrificial destiny himself when he strayed from the path charted for him and allowed his failures to make way for you, champion."
